ch.aplu.util

Class GPanelOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.util.GPanelOptions

  • public class GPanelOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to select initializing options for the ch.aplu.util package. Option set here take precedence over values set in the aplu_util.properties file.

    • Method Detail

      • setPanelTitle

        public static void setPanelTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Default title displayed in the frame title bar. Library value: GPanel.

      • setPanelSize

        public static void setPanelSize(int width,
                int height)
        Default size of graphics area (width, height). Library default: 500 x 500. width and height should be even positive integers. User coordinates (pixels) in range 0..width-1/0..height-1.

      • setPanelPosition

        public static void setPanelPosition(int ulx,
                    int uly)
        Default position of frame (ulx, uly). Library value: Adapted to number of GPanel instances.

      • setPanelRange

        public static void setPanelRange(double xmin,
                 double xmax,
                 double ymin,
                 double ymax)
        Default span of coordinates (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax). Library value: (-1, 1, -1, 1).
